title: MTA public treasury custody with Coinbase Custody
body:
It is proposed to custody some of the public MTA treasury with Coinbase Custody (https://custody.coinbase.com/) for long term storage.

Should we move some of the public MTA treasury to CB Custody, and if so, how much?

This poll will present some options that endeavour to cover all possible preferences. Should it be insufficient a new poll will be created to cover signer preferences.

**Should the mStableDAO custody some of the public MTA treasury with Coinbase?**
choices: Yes - but a different MTA amount
author: 0x4B37BbC8CAb32aade27Ce8b1bb2A9E614de81E03
